name: Zucchini with Dill Weed and Garlic-Yogurt Sauce
author: Turkishcook
summary: This is a refreshing and tasty Mediterranean recipe. You can also use yellow squash to cook it. It is so easy, and it goes well with fresh, crusty bread.
ingredients: ¼ cup uncooked long grain white rice
directions: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir the onion until translucent, about 5 minutes
Stir in the sugar, then add the chopped zucchini, dill, and rice
Cook and stir until the zucchini is softened, about 5 minutes
Pour in the water, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and bring the mixture to a boil
Reduce the heat and simmer the mixture until the rice is cooked, about 20 minutes
Turn off the heat, and let the mixture cool to lukewarm
Make a sauce by mixing the yogurt, garlic, and salt in a bowl
Serve over the lukewarm zucchini and rice
